p: Moreover, COVID-19 is a viral disease not bacterial infection. Therefore, one should avoid in-appropriate administration of antibiotics, although some treatment centre recommended it. Several approaches have been proposed such as lopinavir/ritonavir (400/100 mg every 12 h), chloroquine (500 mg every 12 h), and hydroxyl-chloroquine (200 mg every 12 h). Alpha-interferon (e.g., 5 million units by aerosol inhalation twice per day) is also used [ 30].
